Summary: Mufon Investigator calls UFO and it comes
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Leggett
There were no other sightings in Leggett on or around July 11th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsLocal Mufon investigator told us to take her lead and that if we did that a UFO would come. We did what she asked not really expecting anything to happen. We played drums out side for about 3 hours. My wife was with us she went to bed and soon after a big ball of light came towards us fast I shot a laser beam directly at it then it just went back the way it had come. I never seen anything like it before and now I am more of a believer then I was before.
